Shambhavi Mahamudra Program
 

Shambhavi Mahamudra is a powerful kriya (inner energy process) designed to effect a profound self-transformation. It is a method of bringing your entire system into alignment so that your mind, body, emotions and energy function in complete harmony, establishing a chemistry of blissfulness within you.

Inner Engineering Online
 

It is a program for self-empowerment and personal growth. Offered in 7 sessions to be completed online at your own pace. Participants report higher levels of energy, lower stress, lower fear and anxiety, enhanced mental clarity, emotional balance and productivity, and relief from chronic ailments such as diabetes, hypertension, allergies and insomnia.

  • 7 Online Sessions
  • Guided meditations
